thought: I should get the text on the page first to see if there are any keywords related to scam websites
observation: Elme Communities - Elevating Homes  WashREIT is now Elme Communities. What’s in a name? Learn more here. Elme Communities Our communities Our story Leadership ESG Environment Social Governance Careers Investors News & Events Company Info Financial Info Stock Info SEC Filings Contact us Discover a home to call your own Elme Communities owns and operates communities built to accommodate every life. With emphasis placed on impeccable communication, deep-rooted respect, and sustainable business practices, we offer spaces you’re proud to call home. Explore our communities Elevated value living Thoughtfully-curated We place value on the things money can’t buy—your security, happiness, and safety; your family, roommates, and pets; your home, community, and the world in which we live. We believe high-quality service built on respect, communication, and follow-through is deserved by all—not earned by those within a certain price threshold. And we trust our communities elevate your daily life, offering sensible commutes, energy-efficient appliances, and responsive communication. Communities built for every life Elme Druid Hills Atlanta, GA Riverside Apartments Alexandria, VA Elme Eagles Landing Stockbridge, GA View all communities With the right foundation comes the opportunity for growth Job openings Thriving workplace culture How we treat members of our community correlates with how we treat our team members—with respect, dignity, and openness. We love to be challenged, ask questions, and arrive at the best solutions. If you thrive in a growth environment, want to take part in something fresh and new, and want to make an impact in the industry and your career path, we want to talk to you. Let’s chat RESEARCH-BACKED INVESTMENTS Well-connected communities We provide quality, affordable housing to middle-income renters in locations poised for strong, sustained demand. Research powers our investment strategy, enabling us to target communities in close proximity to high growth industries, transportation, and public services. Our research helps us understand which amenities, neighborhoods, and renovations make the most sense to our residents, and we tailor our specific investment strategy to best create value for our stakeholders. Learn more ESG initiatives Transforming Environmentally conscious We strive to make an environmental impact at the property level, reducing leaks, replacing old appliances, supporting green commutes, and switching to clean energy sources. Socially responsible We’re actively working to close the affordability gap for the value-conscious renter, ensuring the middle class has access to safe housing without government grants. Our initiatives Our board is committed to diverse membership, offering relevant experience from different industries, cultures, and backgrounds. We commit to a high ethical standard for our team and suppliers. We do better so our residents can live better 7550 Wisconsin Ave Ste 900

observation.reason: Based on the content of the URL I cannot find any evidence that this website is a scam. The website does not offer unusually low prices or claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. Additionally the text on the website does not target human psychological weaknesses and there is no information on non-existent companies. The website does not handle different products from common e-commerce websites and the inquiry phone number and email address are appropriate for business use. The privacy of customer information notation is clear and the payment methods are common and usual. Finally the information listed has been updated.
